main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.cache.queue

Class DataCacheSaveQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.cache.queue.DataCacheSaveQueue

  • public class DataCacheSaveQueue
extends Object
    This Class is starts the Save Queue Thread, that saves data to the Databse.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Rsl1122
